resources.string:
Hi, my name is Taren Lewis. 

I am interested in Android App development, stock market analysis, and 8-bit style RPG video games and graphics. 

My previous semester at Penn State I was the Student team leader for a 5 person group project consisting of a NASDAQ and NYSE Sector and Industry analysis tool. 

It had a C++ backend, JS frontend, and was planned to be hosted on an Ubuntu 18.04 Virtual Machine through a droplet on Digital Ocean. 


In my free time, I like to learn about code, lay around in my hammock, go for bike rides, explore the woods behind my house, or play video games with my friends. 


I have experience with the following technologies: 

-C++ 

-Java 

-JS 

-VHDL
